text: THE joke was a quick one. It showed Family Guy ’ s infant Stewie running naked screaming, “ Help! I ’ ve escaped from Kevin Spacey ’ s basement! ” But that 2005 animated clip went viral when Spacey was accused of assaulting several young men in a November 2017 bombshell that lost the 58 - year - old actor his House Of Cards gig and led him to “ seek evaluation and treatment ”. Family Guy creator, and star, Seth MacFarlane said on Thursday at the Television Critics Association ’ s Winter Press Tour he wasn ’ t the one who pitched the controversial joke that made its way into the years - old episode and left many fans wondering what MacFarlane knew about Spacey ahead of the public revelations. “ I don ’ t remember who pitched the joke, ” he told
